Third-party plugins are used to provide access to third-party libraries. They cannot be selected:

  • LLVM: a plugin to access LLVM (including Clang).
  • QJson: a plugin to access the QJson.
  • SUNDIALS: a plugin to access CVODE and IDA from the SUNDIALS library.
  • QScintilla: a plugin to access QScintilla.
  • QtMmlWidget: a plugin to access QtMmlWidget.
  • Qwt: a plugin to access Qwt.
